description: A strategic thinker with a vision for the future, known for their independence and high standards.

meanings.upright: Reasonable and independent, holds high ethical standards.
meanings.reversed: Can be a perfectionist with ulterior motives.

description: A compassionate idealist who values authenticity and seeks harmony in relationships.

meanings.upright: Inspiring with sharp intuition and emotional depth.
meanings.reversed: May indicate emotional confusion or unrealistic expectations.

description: A natural leader who is decisive and enjoys challenges, often seen as assertive and confident.
weaknesses: Can be overly critical of others

meanings.upright: A visionary leader with creativity and ambition.

description: A nurturing and responsible individual who values tradition and loyalty, often seen as a caretaker.

meanings.reversed: May indicate neglect of personal needs.
